name: This is Home: Aestrild x EraLore Studios

metadata.name: This is Home: Aestrild x EraLore Studios
metadata.description:
"With a thoughtful pinch, Elena plucked the dancing purple flower from the earth. Dipping her pen into the inkwell with a delicate care, she began to draw." 
- By Way of the Sea, by EraLore Studios

Aestrild is an Asian-Canadian artist, physician and mom who has been creating traditional and digital paintings for 15+ years. Her works touch upon themes of nature, ancient gods and technology. To learn more about Aestrild, visit: https://thehug.xyz/artists/aestrild.
